alert.note: Alert for Harding; Northern Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 8:49PM MDT until October 27 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Periods of freezing drizzle can be expected through Thursday morning, becoming all snow by late morning. Snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze, with ice developing first on elevated surfaces such as bridges. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Harding County and Northern Perkins County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
